title: Mexico Suite Escape Moments from Historic Aguascalientes City Centre
description: Immerse yourself in the history, culture and traditions of north-central Mexico with a relaxing stay at Quinta Real Aguascalientes, an upscale urban escape perfectly set moments from the historic city centre of Aguascalientes. The facilities are second-to-none, with a superb restaurant and bar serving up mouthwatering Mexican and international cuisine from morning to night, perfectly accompanied by creative cocktails crafted by expert mixologists. Take a stroll around the property's peaceful gardens boasting a spectacular fountain, while a heated swimming pool is perfect for a dip all year round. Live like a local and explore the city on foot, with a plethora of places to visit including the Teatro Aguascalientes, José Guadalupe Posada Museum and Plaza Patria Shopping Center, all a 15-minute walk away.
offer_address: Av Aguascalientes Sur 601, Jardines de la Asunción, 20270 Aguascalientes, Ags., Mexico
